page.title: 04A Stonegate Family
page.content:
There are six people in my family - my father,mother,three brothers and myself.My youngest brother and I go to primary school in Stonegate,whilst my second eldest brother attends the secondary school in the next village- Wadhurst.My eldest brother goes to a special school as he is disabled.Daddy works in London and Mummy looks after the house.We have 16 ducks,one dog and one guinea pig.We like swimming, and Mummy and I enjoy gardening.I have my own piece of garden where I like planting things.My eldest brother is 15 years old.He is very heavy and we need to use a hoist to help him into bed.He likes to eat chocolate and Weetabix,and loves to watch trains.
This was written by the 10 year old daughter of the family.
